# NSPopover.Behavior.transient

**Case**

The system will close the popover when the user interacts with a user interface element outside the popover.

## Declaration

```swift
case transient
```

## Discussion

Note that interacting with menus or panels that become key only when needed will not cause a transient popover to close. The exact interactions that will cause transient popovers to close are not specified.

## Constants

- **NSPopover.Behavior.applicationDefined**: Your application assumes responsibility for closing the popover.
- **NSPopover.Behavior.semitransient**: The system will close the popover when the user interacts with user interface elements in the window containing the popover’s positioning view.
